data.title: Game Reviews
data.meta_description: So, what do you guys predict Perfect Dark Zero will get?   PC City of…
data.text:
So, what do you guys predict Perfect Dark Zero will get?

PC

City of Villans - PC.IGN - 8/10

Jetfighter 2015 - Strategy Informer - 5.5/10

The Matrix: Path of Neo - Strategy Informer - 7.2/10

War World - Boomtown - 8/10

360

Amped 3 - Gamespy - 3.5/5

Amped 3 - 360.IGN - 6.9/10

Condemned: Criminal Origins - Gamespy - 4.5/5

Kameo: Elements of Power - GamePro - 3/5

Ridge Racer 6 - 360.IGN - 7/10

Xbox

America's Army: Rise of a Soldier - TeamXbox - 7.2/10

Darkwatch - Gameplay Monthly - 8.7/10

The Matrix: Path of Neo - Gameplay Monthly - 6.1/10

The Warriors - Gameplay Monthly - 5.5/10 (ouch!)

PS2

Burnout Revenge - Gameplay Monthly - 9.2/10

Dragon Quest 8 - Game Revolution - A-

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas Special Editon - PS2.IGN - 9.6/10

Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects - Gameplay Monthly - 6.1/10

Resident Evil 4: Premium Edition - PS2.IGN - 9.5/10

Smackdown vs Raw 2006 - Gameplay Monthly - 8.8/10

PSP

Metal Gear Acid - Gameplay Monthly - 8.7/10
